script kscript_highlight.txt
sendmouse move -800 0
wait 200
clipboard clear
sendkey ctrl down
sendkey c down
sendkey c up
sendkey ctrl up
clipboard writefile txt.txt
clipboard clear
script kscript_highlight.txt
wait 200
wait 200
clipboard writefile txt2.txt
sendkey rightalt down
wait 200
sendkey tab press
wait 200
sendkey rightalt up
